Why Piot Group?

Because we will partner with you to determine the best way to move forward, with sound advice and strategic recommendations that work. We will help you take calculated risks to minimize the downside in your investment and maximize the potential of your venture. We will leverage our vast network of connections to help facilitate decision making that moves transactions forward.

Business development & advisory services

We are skilled practitioners in the areas of commercial real estate and structured finance. Our principals are innovators that lead market change. We can put this culture of innovation to work for you and provide solutions to problems of valuation, risk management and investment strategy.

View more

Venture capital funding

Our access to capital and history of building and managing businesses from the ground up positions us uniquely. We can invest capital as a financial investment and leverage our expertise to enhance returns. As experts in technology and operations we target companies in industries where a slight technological advantage can yield a large advantage operationally.

View more

Property investment

Utilizing our expertise and industry connections we are able to invest in attractive value added opportunities across a wide range of property types and geographies. Our experienced team can access capital and transactions efficiently and craft innovative solutions that present attractive returns while limiting downside.

View more
